name: Boil water
pseudocode: 1. Fill kettle with water. 2. Turn on the kettle and wait until the water boils.

description: Steep tea bag in hot water
name: Steep tea bag
pseudocode: 1. Place tea bag in a mug. 2. Pour hot water over the tea bag. 3. Let the tea steep for the recommended time. 4. Remove the tea bag.
